message: I watched a movie the other day that was all OS. Wisps of an MC, no IC. The OS was a heist, so Activity. Can anyone thknk
...think of a thin movie -- one, two domains -- that is not OS ACTIVITY?
Is Tom Hanks in a Situation in Cast Away?

I believe so, and I also agree that "Castaway" does not fit the definition of a Grand Argument Story -- that it doesn't really cover all the domains -- although I think Chris may disagree with me.  I've heard him say that Wilson the Volleyball is the IC, but I never saw it that way.

I do think that MOST of Castaway fits into a GAS, but not all of it.  Wilson (the ball) "voices" the alternative view to that of the MC, even though it is an expression of the MC's doubts and misgivings.

Transformers 2 is a VERY thin movie, by your definition.  Mostly OS, a little bit of MC, and no IC or relationship.
I believe so, but there so little else that it bears little resemblance to a storyform.
I haven't seen Transformers 2, but I'm assuming the OS Domain is Activity.
